org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote

Interface RemoteFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, RemoteDirectoryEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileDelegate

    public interface RemoteFile
extends RemoteDirectoryEntry
    Represents a file in the working directory of a workflow instance run, or in some sub-directory of it.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    RemoteDirectory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendContents(byte[] data)
      Append the data to the file.
      void copy(RemoteFile sourceFile)
      Copy from another file to this one.
      byte[] getContents(int offset, int length)
      Read from the file.
      String getNativeHost() 
      String getNativeName() 
      long getSize() 
      void setContents(byte[] data)
      Write the data to the file, totally replacing what was there before.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote.RemoteDirectoryEntry

        destroy, getContainingDirectory, getModificationDate, getName

    • Method Detail

      • getContents

        @Nonnull
byte[] getContents(int offset,
                            int length)
                     throws RemoteException,
                            IOException
        Read from the file.
        Parameters:
        offset - Where in the file to read the bytes from.
        length - How much of the file to read; -1 for "to the end".
        Returns:
        The literal byte contents of the given section of the file.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong reading the file.

      • setContents

        void setContents(@Nonnull
                 byte[] data)
          throws RemoteException,
                 IOException
        Write the data to the file, totally replacing what was there before.
        Parameters:
        data - The literal bytes that will form the new contents of the file.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong writing the contents.

      • appendContents

        void appendContents(@Nonnull
                    byte[] data)
             throws RemoteException,
                    IOException
        Append the data to the file.
        Parameters:
        data - The literal bytes that will be appended.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong writing the contents.

      • getSize

        long getSize()
      throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The length of the file, in bytes.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • copy

        void copy(@Nonnull
          RemoteFile sourceFile)
   throws RemoteException,
          IOException
        Copy from another file to this one.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The other file to copy from.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong during the copy.

      • getNativeName

        @Nonnull
String getNativeName()
                       throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The full native OS name for the file.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getNativeHost

        @Nonnull
String getNativeHost()
                       throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The host holding the file.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
